name: IpLibraryLoader
brief:
Dynamic library loading for runtime solver selection

LibraryLoader provides platform-independent dynamic library loading:
- dlopen()/dlsym() on POSIX systems
- LoadLibrary()/GetProcAddress() on Windows

Used to load linear solver libraries (HSL, Pardiso, etc.) at runtime
without compile-time linkage. Allows users to provide proprietary
solvers without recompiling Ipopt.

IPOPT_SHAREDLIBEXT defined to "so", "dylib", or "dll" per platform.

@since 3.14.0
see: Linear solver interface files for usage examples
